Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-27319 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.2.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-27319 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.2.2-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package pytorch is earlier than 2.2.2-1, affected by CVE-2024-27319
